page.title: 13Local Methodist Churches
page.content: { Lammack}New extensions in 1984 provided extra space to serve the growing community. The building is a centre for a good deal of life and activity for both young and old. Brownies and Guides are just some of the users. This year is the 25th anniversary of the church and various events have marked this. Recently there has been a development of partnerships between different denominations.{ {Mellor}1985 saw the official opening of a new chapel, replacing a much larger building. During the period of demolition and rebuilding, the Methodists held services in the nearby Roman Catholic Mass Centre. During the two years a special relationship grew. Inter church partnership will continue to be a feature of the new life on the hill.
